title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing insects in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of the dream of seeing insects in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail We will explain it in detail through our article because insects are visions that leave behind many questions, as we know that insects are among the creatures that pose a danger to humans, there are types of poisonous insects such as scorpions, so the human dreams begin About insects: You feel fear and anxiety from the dream and want to know its interpretation. A detailed interpretation of the dream of insects by Ibn Sirin. Insects in a dream in the bed is an indication of many problems. Seeing a large number of insects in a dream is evidence of many problems and fears that the dreamer falls into. A dream of insect bites is evidence of A serious illness that the dreamer suffers from. If a person sees that he is carrying insects in his hand and is exposed to great harm, this indicates some problems that he may fall into because of some corrupt people around him. The presence of a large number of insects in the bed is evidence of the wife’s disobedience to her and the emergence of many problems in Her life and it could lead to divorce and separation as quickly as possible. Interpretation of a dream about insects for a single woman. The answer to the question: Interpretation of a dream about insects: An unmarried girl’s dream about being bitten by insects is evidence of betrayal that the man of her life will reveal. If you dream of a girl and the insect bite is strong, this indicates that her relationship will not succeed and she must stay away from it. The man she loves. Insects in an unmarried woman’s dream are evidence of her exposure to sad and disturbing events. The escape of insects is evidence of eliminating problems and success in life. Interpretation of a dream of insects for a married woman. Insects in a dream for a woman. A married woman is evidence of problems and tension. A dream of escaping from insects is evidence of the collapse of worries and the end Problems. Dreaming of lice in a dream is evidence of the righteousness of this woman and her husband. Killing insects in a dream indicates the end of all the problems that this woman suffers from. Dreaming of crawling insects is evidence of the presence of a man in this woman’s life who has no religion. Dreaming of fighting insects indicates the presence of an enemy. Near the dreamer. Insect bites indicate the presence of a woman in her husband’s life. Interpretation of a dream about insects for a pregnant woman. Insects in a pregnant woman’s dream testify to the difficulties she is going through during childbirth. Escaping from insects is evidence of a healthy, disease-free child. If a pregnant woman sees insects coming out of her body This indicates the safety of the newborn. Insect pests in a pregnant woman’s dream are evidence of the presence of enemies in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of a dream about insects for a man. Insects in an unmarried young man’s dream are evidence of the problems and sorrows he is experiencing. Killing insects in a dream is evidence of achieving goals and desires. Seeing an error is a sign of A failed marriage. Dreaming of crawling insects in a dream is evidence of a young man’s marriage to a dishonest girl. Seeing him catching insects without being harmed by them is evidence that the dreamer gets rid of all the negative qualities that characterize him. Ants in a dream indicate fatigue, effort, and trouble. The meaning of seeing insects. Seeing a cockroach killed In a dream, it is evidence of insects in general, and evidence of the disappearance of envy. If a person sees in a dream insects coming out on him as

title: Interpretation of seeing the number 71 in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The meaning of the interpretation of a single woman indicates her close marriage to someone she desires in her life during this period, and seeing that she is pregnant in a dream is a sign of happiness, and from our translator we will explain to you its interpretation of seeing the number 71 in a dream.Interpretation of seeing the number 71 in a dream for a single girl. An unmarried woman who dreams of writing The number 71 in a dream and she was in good shape. Here, it indicates that there are important things that this woman will see in his life. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is thinking of the number 71 in a dream, which is a suitable shape. It indicates that this single woman will have good luck In her life. And seeing in a dream an unmarried woman writing the number 71 in ornate English. An indication that there is something very important that she will live and achieve in this one person in his life. Seeing the number 71 in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the good conduct of her affairs. And that she will excel in her family and in Her life is in good character, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. An unmarried woman who sees the number 71 in a dream symbolizes happiness and excellence in her life. It indicates the good things that she will see, God willing. See also: Interpretation of seeing the number 73 in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a man. Interpretation of seeing the number 71 In a dream for a married woman: Seeing the number 71 in a married woman’s dream indicates a lot of goodness and livelihood that she will see in her life, God willing. It appears that a married woman writing the number 71 in a dream indicates the calmness of her married life. Then about the problems and worries in her life, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. It also explains that the married dreamer who asks her husband to write the number 71 in a dream indicates the goodness that she will see in her life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Because the number 71 in the dream symbolizes the married woman and the stability of her marital life. She is able to get rid of the problems she sees in it or the fears that affect her. It is now. A married woman who looks at the number 71 with one of her children shows her success in raising them. And they will experience long periods of happiness with them in life. Interpretation of seeing the number 71 in a dream for a divorced woman. It explains that a divorced woman who sees the number 71 in a dream and adorns herself. An indication of the good things that she will experience. In it in peace, without problems or worries. Although a divorced woman draws the number 71 in a dream well. It shows the good things that she will find in her life, God willing, during this time. Also, seeing the number 71 in a divorced woman’s dream indicates the good luck that she will have. The divorced woman in her life during this period of time. The divorced woman who sees her ex-husband giving her the number 71 in a dream and it was decorated and beautiful. It shows his great desire to return to her again at this time. If a divorced woman sees that she is buying the number 71 in a dream and it is colorful. Here is the interpretation of her marriage. From a good and righteous man in life. He will be very happy, God willing. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream indicates the number 71, which is in Hebrew, for her success in the new job at this time. title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing a magician in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website provides you with an interpretation of seeing a magician. We have collected for you a dream about a magician, a married and pregnant woman, as well as a man, according to the books of major scholars in the interpretation of dreams. And visions. What is the interpretation of seeing a magician, Ibn Sirin? A complete interpretation of a dream about a magician from the book of Ibn Sirin, who said that this indicates the appearance of unpleasant things with the dreamer in his next life. Seeing a magician in a dream is complete evidence that the dreamer thinks a lot about magical affairs, or perhaps it is Just a dream. Also, seeing complete magic in a dream is a sign of the evil that will happen to the dreamer in his life and an indication of problems and worries. Seeing a magician in a dream is full of visions that indicate the presence of a paralyzed, lying, and cunning person in the dreamer’s life, and you must pay attention to him. The dreamer who falls In the hand of a magician and bewitching another person with him is a sign of expelling evil and freedom from envy and intrigue. To dream of a magician for a common woman. What is the interpretation of a witch seeing a single woman among the visions that warned her of the presence of a liar and defects in her life? In addition, seeing a single woman in a dream is full of With a man who has charmed her indicates that she has made many mistakes that interfere with her work. Seeing a married woman in a magical dreamWhy a magician dreams of a married woman in a complete dream indicates that someone is deceiving her, provoking her, and wants to bring her troubles and troubles. Seeing magic in a completed dream for a married woman as a whole It means that she is ignorant of her religion and far from God and religious matters. Seeing a pregnant woman in a magical dream: A healer in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of her extreme fear of pregnancy and childbirth and many exhausting meditations. Seeing a magical woman in a dream of a pregnant woman means that there are people who hate her and speak ill of her. Why dream of defeating a magician in a complete dream? The magician beating the dreamer in a complete dream indicates that he will suffer from illness and excessive exhaustion and is a sign of the dreamer’s betrayal. The dreamer who defeats the magician and the magician who escapes has desired visions that show that he has been liberated from his enemies and haters. Also, seeing A magician being struck and killed in a complete dream is good news to get rid of all worries and get rid of sadness and evil. The death of a magician in a final dream. The death of a magician in a dream is excellent evidence of victory over enemies, the release of the dreamer from prison, and the return of the absent person. Why does an evil witch dream? Seeing an evil witch in a dream Sentences of unpleasant visions that indicate the presence of a character in the dreamer that will cause many misfortunes in his life. Seeing an evil witch in a married woman’s dream indicates that there is a woman who wants to destroy her home for her sake. Meet the wizard in a completed dream The discovery of a completely convincing witch indicates in A dream indicates the presence of someone very close to the dreamer who is conspiring against him. If you have a dream and want to interpret it, leave it in the comments below and our team will respond to you.

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the appearance of peace in a dream?

preview.html: Learn more about the interpretation of seeing a staircase in a dream. A staircase is a group of wooden, iron or steel boards placed one on top of the other in an inclined manner. Its purpose is to ascend or descend to and from floors. When the dreamer sees the staircase in his dream, he begins to search for an interpretation of his dream, and each of you will know. Now the interpretation of his dream about stairs from this article. You still do not find an interpretation of your dream? Go to Google and search for an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about peace. Ibn Sirin said that seeing the stairs in a dream means an imbalance in his life and the emergence of difficulties in reality. Traveling is one of the signs of a dream about peace, so if a person sees peace in his dream, he will have the opportunity to travel in reality. If A married woman saw the stairs in her dream, this means that she is a successful person as a mother and wife, and if she sees that she climbed the stairs, this is evidence of her excellence. This dream is not good. Because it indicates either failure or the emergence of many problems with her husband that lead to divorce. If the dreamer sees a long ladder in a dream, this interprets that the dreamer will be healthy in body and that his life will be long and God will give him unlimited money. A long ladder in the dream of a man who is not married After being tied in knots. If a man dreams of a long ladder, this means that he will travel and work abroad and this opportunity will be a turning point in his life. If the dreamer dreams of a long ladder, but it is broken, it is interpreted that the dreamer will hear the news of the death of one of his relatives. The stairs are interpreted Long or large in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates a happy engagement and marriage soon. If the dreamer sees that he climbed the stairs and stood at the highest level, then this dream confirms that its owner is an intrusive personality and likes to interfere with the privacy of others, and this vision also confirms that he is a spying person. Everyone around him. If the dreamer dreams that he is putting the ladder on the ground and making sure it is set well so that he can climb the stairs, then this dream is an indication that the dreamer is a person who is not afraid of anything and is not exposed. betrayal by anyone in the future; Because God's protection will always be with him. What is the interpretation of a dream of climbing stairs? If the dreamer dreams that he is climbing the stairs quite easily without getting tired or two approaches, then the vision indicates either recovery or job promotion in the near future. If the dreamer climbs a wooden ladder, this means that there is A large position in the position will soon become the dreamer's wealth or he will buy a house larger than the house he lives in now and his life will change from hardship to prosperity and many good things. An unemployed person who wants to get a job in reality and saw in his dream that he is climbing a wooden ladder, and the vision appears Work and the dreamer will find a job soon, but he will get this job in a dishonest way. Interpretation of the dream of descending the stairs. Ibn Sirin confirmed that the dreamer descending the stairs in a dream explains that his life is complicated and will become more complex in the coming period as a result of the many problems that he suffers from. Seeing the dreamer descending the stairs in his dream It means that there is a harmful person approaching him and he is exposed to danger or harm because of that person. When he dreams

title: What is the interpretation of seeing boils in a dream?

preview.html: Khadot website offers you a complete interpretation of seeing boiling in a dream. As you know, boils are pimples that appear on the body and can be one of the most vulnerable parts of human skin. Seeing boils in a dream is one of the visions that came. The dreams of many people, so we have collected for you, my dear, in God, all the evidence to know the interpretation of the dream of a boil on the leg, as well as the interpretation of the dream of the boil on the leg. As we told you, dear ones, the interpretation of sleep about boiling in the abdomen and the interpretation of sleep about boiling in the thigh are among the books of major scholars in interpreting dreams and visions. If you are interested in knowing the interpretation, you should follow the article. Why dream of a boil in Ibn Sirin? The interpretation of seeing a boil in a dream completed by Ibn Sirin’s dream book is a guide for the dreamer to do good, increase profits and earn a lot of money. Since the interpretation of boiling on the head in a dream indicates thinking Proper and correct, which is what distinguishes the dreamer from others, and also indicates his wisdom, the strength of his discrimination, and his ability to bear many responsibilities. The dream book about a boil on the thigh in a complete dream indicates to the dreamer that he is moving from his home or city, and this vision shows movement from one place to another , which may be a trip near its owner. The vision will come. The interpretation of seeing a boil on the leg in a dream fully indicates that this is one of the praiseworthy and desirable visions for the dreamer and testifies to a life full of happiness and luxury and also indicates psychological comfort. What the dreamer experiences. Why dream of boiling in the lower abdomen in a complete dream? It is one of the visions that testify to the dreamer’s success in his projects and always achieve success in achieving his goals and desires and testify to the positive changes that the dreamer will feel in the projects of life. Next Life The great scholar Ibn Sirin said about the interpretation of seeing pus coming out of a boil, and it is good news for the dreamer to earn a lot of money in a short time, and this may indicate that the dreamer will inherit it. It will make his life better, and God knows best. See also: Why dream of contracting smallpox in a dream? Seeing boils in a complete dream for an ordinary woman. Interpretation of seeing a boil on the face in a complete dream for an unmarried girl is evidence of a lot of goodness and joys and earning money for a lot of money and the presence of the largest number of boils on her face. It denotes many sizes and joys. Joys. A lot of wealth and happiness. Seeing boils on the body in a common woman’s dream is one of the visions that testify to a successful romantic relationship for the girl, as it indicates the presence of a good man in her life who will be the reason for her happiness. . The interpretation of seeing boils on a girl’s hand in a dream is good news for her about marrying a generous, honest, and just person. The boils indicate a man rich in money who will make her life full of luxury. Seeing pus coming out of a boil in a dream is one of the desired visions that indicate the girl’s successes and achievements in life. And achieving those goals and aspirations that she aspired to, and seeing the boil in her mouth is evidence of that. . This close marriage.See also: Why dream of scabiesWhy

title: The 40 most important interpretations of seeing a dream about liver in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin and major scholars

preview.html: Interpretations of leading scholars for seeing liver in dreams: Liver is one of the dishes that many people love, and liver dreams are classified into visions that provide beautiful and promising suggestions. With the distinguished Egyptian website, your way of interpreting your dreams will be easier and clearer. Please read the following article carefully because it contains the most accurate interpretations mentioned by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Al-Sadiq and Al-Usaimi. Liver in a dream When we talk about the interpretation of a dream about liver, we must present to you the most important interpretations that the translators said about this vision, which is a peaceful life, and also if the dreamer eats liver and it tastes better in the dream. The dream, this is a symbol of his offspring, most of whom are male. A man asked one of the interpreters and told him that I dreamed that I opened the stomach of someone I know and took his liver out of his stomach and ate it. The translator gave him good news and said: “There is no need to be afraid of the vision, because it means money that God sends you, so you must be prepared to receive it and keep it.” Sirin indicated that this dream means money and property belonging to the dreamer’s children, but as for seeing the dreamer eating from the liver, this means It indicates that he controls his children's money and disposes of it as he wishes. In the interpretation that the dreamer can take his children's money by turning it into his own property. Asking a man who had grown children in his youth and said that he dreams of eating liver, the interpreter answered that you will get a lot of benefits from your children, perhaps they will spend on you and take over everything in your life. Free will. If the dreamer dreams that his stomach is open and his liver is torn, this is a sign of losing his son to death. If the dreamer sees more than one liver in his dream, this is an increase in money, but if he sees that he is eating from it, this is a sign that he will soon need to withdraw some money Saved because you will get into trouble and have to spend some money to escape. For example, any legal problem needs a lawyer and certainly this lawyer must have money to get his rights in exchange for the case he is doing, and one of the dreamers said that he dreamed of a lot of livers and he took one of them and ate it because he was sick in the dream, the interpreter said that you will become exhausted. From illness, but since you are a person with a high degree of financial management, you have been saving money for a while and will now share this money to perform surgery or buy medicine suitable for your condition until you recover, God willing. If a married woman sees a liver in her dream, it is either a sheep’s liver or a buffalo’s liver. Cows indicate pregnancy, and it has been said in some visions that the liver is a symbol that the dreamer is sick with anemia or anemia, and he saw in his dream that he realizes that his body needs healthy foods. After seeing this vision, he must go to the doctor and undergo the necessary examination and carefully examine his condition to prevent anything from occurring. Complications in his health. Charity is a very important thing in the life of a Muslim, and if the dreamer eats liver in his sleep, this is a warning vision for him that he has not believed for a while and he must come back and insist on it, until God declares it. It removes evil or affliction from him. Seeing someone eating liver in his dream means that he is not satisfied with the amount of knowledge he has acquired, but wants to gain more.

title: Interpretation of seeing a child urinating on the floor in a dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a manager in a dream - Interpretation of a dream about an employer

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing the manager in a dream and the job holder in a dream through the Moments dream interpretation website. We will deal with the following lines, the meaning of seeing the manager and how the dreamer deals with him in the dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the manager in a dream: Seeing the manager in a dream indicates the mind of the dreamer and his idea regarding a specific and specific thing or It generally indicates his behavior and nature in life, and seeing a smiling manager is an indication of a sound mind, pure and pure of heart, while seeing an angry manager frowning suggests loneliness and introversion. Seeing an angry employee in a dream can portend serious consequences and many disagreements and problems. The manager may symbolize the mother, father, or the person responsible for the family’s demands, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a director for single people: Seeing an unmarried or unmarried girl in a dream is a conversation and the employer told her kindly and politely, or holding her hand, this is interpreted as a happy event near her, if she An unmarried woman is a girl or a woman who works for him. As for an unmarried woman seeing as if her manager had given her a financial reward as a result of her own hardships at work in a dream, this is interpreted as good and abundant livelihood following patience and diligence. But if she sees an unmarried woman in her dream, As if her manager proposes to her or marries her, this is her interpretation of his promotion at work and his assuming another position. Seeing one girl in a dream is like sitting with the manager in his office to discuss matters at work. This portends her marriage to a person of high status and influence, especially if the meeting took place in happy weather without anything. The interpretation also applies to seeing shaking hands or kissing an employer in a dream. As for sitting with the employer in a restaurant or seeing a single woman in her dream, as if she loves her manager and that the manager is treating her in the same way, this indicates a stable romantic life. Interpretation of a director’s dream for a married woman: To see a woman For a married woman, especially a working woman, and if her employer or manager visited her at home in her dream, it is considered a harbinger of an improvement in her physical and living conditions, especially if the married woman sees her manager smiling at her visit. Fruits or sweets. But if a married woman sees in her dream that her husband or father is the one who has become a manager and business owner, then this portends goodness, comfort, and the end of difficulties and worries, and God knows best. Interpretation of a manager’s dream about a pregnant woman. As for seeing a director in a pregnant woman’s dream, it is a vision that portends goodness, safety, and good news. The happy one indicates her health and the safety of her fetus. Commentators said that seeing the manager and employer providing a pregnant woman with men’s children’s clothing indicates the birth of a girl, and on the contrary, if she sees that the gift is girls’ children’s clothing, this indicates the birth of a girl. A child is clearer. In a dream of a pregnant woman, the manager can refer to the doctor and the person who monitors her condition and safety. Whenever the director and the employer appear in a pregnant woman’s dream with a happy and cheerful face, this indicates goodness, security, and happy news, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a dream about a quarrel with a brother in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a quarrel with a brother in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams is one of the sciences that many people are interested in in their lives, so many seek to understand what happens to them in their dreams every night. His dreams, many seek to interpret this dream, and here in our article we will explain the interpretation of a dream of a quarrel with a brother in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of a quarrel with a brother in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin mentioned that seeing a quarrel with siblings or the family in general is one of the dreams that a person often has . And indicators, including: This dream is evidence of the strength of the relationship between them and the intensity of love, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. He also sees that the dispute between siblings, parents, or husband is an indication of the stress and tension that the dreamer is suffering from because there are some problems between them in reality, but he is trying to absorb This anger and tension in the dream. If the dreamer sees that he is arguing with one of his sisters using offensive profanity, then this dream is an indication of the dreamer’s desire to get rid of the problems and conflicts that he faces in reality. Interpretation of dreams of fighting with a brother in a dream, seeing the dreamer himself fighting with siblings Or parents in general, with the fighting reaching beatings and violence. This dream is an indication of the presence of great negative energy within the dreamer because he empties it in the dream. It is also an indication of the presence of many differences between them and the inability to get rid of these differences in reality, and God Almighty is Most High and All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees that he is arguing with his brothers and actually feels that his brothers do not love him, then this dream reflects the feeling of not loving his parents and the feeling of alienation in his life among them. See also: What is the interpretation of a dream about seeing a fight in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and what does it indicate? Interpretation of a dream about a quarrel with a brother. In a dream for a single woman, interpretation of dreams about fighting with a brother in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin. Some people believe that dreams are nothing but some random thoughts that the subconscious mind is trying to get rid of and the chaos they cause in the minds. A dream about fighting with a brother indicates the following: In the life of a married woman, this may indicate failure and despair in life and the coming days. I also indicated that a dream about a fight with family and relatives is one of the most indicative dreams of hatred and malice hidden in the heart. Seeing a fight in a dream It is a psychological factor. Fighting with weapons in a dream with the girl’s brother and her parents is a sign of emotional emptiness. The dream of fighting for an unmarried woman is the result of events in her life that may indicate disagreements and problems. If a girl dreams of one of her relatives being beaten by one of her relatives, this indicates That she will get married soon, with a person of status and destiny. Interpretation of a dream about a quarrel with a brother in a dream about a married woman. A married woman is afraid of a dream about a quarrel with a brother in a dream, and this dream can indicate many connotations in the life of a married woman, and the interpretation of a dream about a quarrel with a brother in A dream is one of the most important interpretations. From this dream: This dream of a married woman may indicate her intense love and closeness to her brother. If a married woman sees in a dream a quarrel with a brother or one of her relatives,

title: Seeing a married woman getting married in a dream and the most important clues about it

preview.html: Seeing a married woman getting married again in a dream: Marriage is an attribute of God on earth, it is an attribute of chastity and chastity, and one of the cores of religion, and seeing a married woman getting married again is a promising vision that indicates happiness and stability in her married life. A grant or promotion at work for her or her husband, and a prestigious position, as it indicates success, success, and good news. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman getting married without her husband: Seeing a wedding party in a dream shows a lot of goodness and benefits to the fortuneteller. It indicates the marriage of a married woman to a man other than her husband, but to a man. last. It is a vision that bodes well for the dreamer. Seeing the marriage of a pregnant woman married to a strange man indicates the imminent birth and delivery of a son. I dreamed that I was married to someone other than my husband. Seeing marriage to a famous man, indicates the famous position of the fortune teller. It also indicates good news for the pioneer. Seeing marriage From a well-known man, relative or friend. It indicates that he will benefit greatly from this person, partnership and many good things. It may indicate a business plan or joint investment. It also indicates new changes for the better and improvement of material conditions. It may indicate the purchase of something new in her life, such as Real estate, a car, or a financial reward. I dreamed that my cousin got married and she is married. Seeing a woman marrying someone other than her husband indicates that this dreamer has heard good news. Seeing a divorced woman getting married again indicates a collapse of worry and worry and a change in her life for the better. Seeing the dreamer’s sister getting married once. Other, it may portend the collapse of a problem and a difficult stage in her life, and if she is newly married, this means pregnancy. I dreamed that my sister got married and she is already married, and I am single. This vision suggests that he heard good news and that the girl’s engagement or marriage is approaching. I dreamed that my friend got married and she is already married. Seeing my friend’s wedding indicates Good news. And fulfill your desires and overcome difficult stages. The vision also suggests stability and marital happiness to the viewer. The vision also indicates an improvement in the friend’s financial level, and if there is a problem, it will end soon, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my friend as a bride in a white dress. Seeing my friend in a dream in a white dress means happiness and stability. And prosperity for the fortune teller and friend. Seeing a white dress indicates the death of fatigue and suffering and recovery from illness. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman marrying another wealthy man. Seeing a married woman’s wedding indicates good luck and radical changes in the dreamer’s life. If a married man sees that his wife married another man, this indicates To get rid of problems and worries. Seeing marriage to a rich man means abundant livelihood and finding appropriate solutions to problems. And if a girl sees that her sister got married and got married in the first place, this indicates the nearness of relief and payment of debts. I dreamed that I married someone other than my husband and I was sad for the pregnant woman. If she sees If a pregnant woman married someone other than her husband and felt sad about her marriage, then this vision may indicate the birth of a girl. Also, seeing her sadness shows joy and happiness. Seeing her marrying a stranger indicates the birth of a boy. I dreamed that I got married while I was sad.

Seeing marriage to a rich man means abundant livelihood and finding appropriate solutions to problems. And if a girl sees that her sister got married and got married in the first place, this indicates the nearness of relief and payment of debts. I dreamed that I married someone other than my husband and I was sad for the pregnant woman. If she sees If a pregnant woman married someone other than her husband and felt sad about her marriage, then this vision may indicate the birth of a girl. Also, seeing her sadness shows joy and happiness. Seeing her marrying a stranger indicates the birth of a boy. I dreamed that I got married while I was sad.
